# Pull Request

## Summary
Provide a brief summary of the changes in this PR.

## Type of Change
Select the type of change by replacing `[ ]` with `[x]`:

- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Bug Fix
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Documentation Update
- [ ] Other (describe below)

## Description
Explain what was changed, why it was changed, and any relevant context.

## Related Issues
Link any related issues (e.g. `Closes #12`, `Fixes #34`).

Describe the steps to verify the changes:

1.
2.
3.

## Screenshots (if applicable)
Attach screenshots or logs here.

## Checklist
Ensure all items are completed before submitting:

- [ ] I have tested the changes locally
- [ ] I have updated documentation (if needed)
- [ ] I have reviewed my code for potential issues
- [ ] My changes follow the project's coding style
